posts.title: Omicron fallout: Centre and Maharashtra bicker over new guidelines; 6 travellers from 'at-risk' countries test COVID-positive
posts.desc: Over 3,000 people from flights arriving in India from 'at risk' countries were screened at various airports across the country on Wednesday

posts.title: Dam Safety Bill, 2019 to be discussed in Rajya Sabha today: Key features of proposed legislation
posts.desc: Introduced in the Lok Sabha in July 2019, the Dam Safety Bill provides for the surveillance, inspection, operation and maintenance of specified dams in India via a regulatory body

posts.title: Cyclone Jawad likely to hit Odisha coast on 4 December: State's tryst with cyclones in recent years
posts.desc: The weather agency has predicted heavy to very heavy rainfall for some districts in the eastern state in lieu of the storm

posts.title: US giant Enron filed for bankruptcy 20 years ago: Collapse that ruined lives, revealed dark side of business
posts.desc: The fall of Enron, then ranked as the seventh-largest company in the United States, affected thousands of employees and shook Wall Street to its core

posts.title: Why increased rainfall in the Arctic is bad news not only for polar region but the whole world
posts.desc: The Arctic water cycle is expected to shift from a snow-dominated one towards a rain-dominated one during the 21st century, although the timing of this is uncertain.

posts.title: Hope to get clearer picture from BCCI in next couple of days: Virat Kohli on South Africa tour
Mumbai Weather Update, India vs New Zealand 2nd Test: Rain threat looms ahead of second Test
posts.desc: Mumbai Weather Forecast: Get latest news and update on Mumbai weather forecast today, India vs New Zealand news, Ind vs NZ 2nd Test, Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai at Firstcricket.

posts.title: Eight fishermen missing off Gujarat coast after strong winds destroy boats
posts.desc: Locals claimed that at least 10 boats were completely destroyed and 40 others, which were anchored at the coast, were partially damaged due to the stormy weather

posts.title: Sanju Samson's retention was no-brainer, he is Rajasthan Royals' long-term leader, says Kumar Sangakkara
posts.desc: Having appointed Samson as their captain before the 2021 season, the Royals have chosen the batter as the first retained player for Rs 14 crore

posts.title: India vs New Zealand: Upbeat Black Caps eye history as Kohli and Co face selection dilemma in Mumbai Test
posts.desc: India face several tough choices heading into the second Test against New Zealand in Mumbai, including choosing between Shreyas Iyer on the one side and Ajinkya Rahane and Cheteshwar Pujara on the other.

posts.title: Bounce Infinity E1 e-scooter launched in India at Rs 79,999, has a claimed range of 85 km
posts.desc: Based on 22Motorsâ€™ Flow, the Bounce Infinity E1 will also be available for purchase with the lithium-ion battery, at a price of Rs 68,999; deliveries begin in March 2022.

posts.title: Maharashtra to issue revised air travel guidelines in couple of days, says health minister
posts.desc: Maharashtra has mandated seven-day institutional quarantine for travellers arriving in the state from 'at-risk' countries under the guidelines issued by the State Disaster Management Authority on Tuesday night.

posts.title: India slams OHCHR, says it 'betrays' lack of understanding of security challenges due to cross-border terrorism
posts.desc: The United Nations had recently expressed concern over the arrest of Khurram Parvez by the National Investigation Agency on 22 November

posts.title: BWF World Tour Finals: Satwik-Chirag pair pulls out of tournament due to injury
posts.desc: Satwik and Chirag, ranked 11th in the World, had become the first Indian men's doubles pair to qualify for the prestigious season-ending tournament after finishing at the semifinal stage of the Indonesia Open Super 1000 tournament last week.

posts.title: Ship with over 600 passengers towed to safety after being stranded off Lakshadweep coast
posts.desc: MV Kavaratti was stranded on Wednesday after a fire broke out in its engine room and the engine had to be shut down after extinguishing the flames

posts.title: Top Shiromani Akali Dal leader Manjinder Singh Sirsa joins BJP ahead of Punjab Assembly polls
posts.desc: Sirsa has been a prominent face of the Akali Dal in the national capital and was a strong supporter of the farmers' protests against the three contentious farm laws.

posts.title: Delhi's air quality slips to 'severe' category, minimum temperature rises
posts.desc: According to Ministry of Earth Science's air quality monitor SAFAR', the air quality is likely to improve from Friday onwards due to better wind speed.

posts.title: BWF World Tour Finals: Srikanth goes down to Kunlavut Vitidsarn; Ashwini-Sikki suffer second successive defeat
posts.desc: World number 14 Srikanth, who had reached the knockout stage in the 2014 edition of the year-ending event, went down 18-21 7-21 to three-time junior world champion Vitidsarn in a 46-minute men's singles match.

posts.title: LaLiga: Karim Benzema helps Real Madrid beat Athletic Bilbao, solidify themselves at top of the table
posts.desc: Benzema's 20th goal in 24 games this season proved the difference in a 1-0 victory at the Santiago Bernabeu that puts Madrid firmly in charge of the Spanish title race, even after only 15 games played.

posts.title: 'Deluge of waste': United States is world's biggest plastic polluter, finds report
posts.desc: On average, every American generates 130 kilograms (286 pounds) of plastic waste per year, with Britain next on the list at 99 kilos per person per year, followed by South Korea at 88 kilos per year.
